Did you try stripping all but the id parameter from the query string?  
Would the following java-string regex work for you in the regex 
canonicalization rule?

"^([^?]+\\?)(?:.*)(id=[0-9]+)(?:.*)"

Then for format in the regex canonicalization rule, fill in:

${1}${2}

Would that work?

Otherwise, you might have to write your own canonicalization rule. 

You should probably do the rule as an override so it only applies to the 
intended domain (unless this is the only domain you are crawling).

St.Ack
P.S. I find this site useful figuring regexes: 
*http://www.fileformat.info/tool/regex.htm*
